headline: Exclusive-KKR, Bain bids ranged from $4.8 billion to $7.6 billion for Seven & i assets, sources say
summary: Private equity firms including KKR and Bain Capital offered from around 750 billion yen to around 1.2 trillion yen in a first round of bidding for the non-core assets of Japan's Seven & i Holdings,...
